Articles.Content: Just a compilation
These look beautiful man!!! Especially love the Soyuz + lander
I liked the third one. Love isn't limited to the air anymore, it can reach the MÃƒÂ¼n.....and further out in SPAAAAAAAAAACE! (Except for me, in which it extends no further than 2 cm)
The first one is very poignant, but would it be possible to rotate it 90 degrees? I can see some people trying to crick their necks looking at these!

Hello, fellow rocketeers! I just wanted to share some of my sketches based on KSP and real life.

My art skill has greatly improved over the course of a year, and you can really see the difference

in these drawings.

Also, the original copies of the art are much better looking; they didn't scan well.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

'Liftoff' and 'Photos from Minmus' are from my slightly less skilled, past self.

A much better-drawn sketch of the Orion spacecraft is soon to come, I need to get it polished up.
